module.name: clockspeed
module.summary: Clockspeed simple network time protocol client

interface.name: clockspeed_domtrans_cli
interface.summary: Execute clockspeed utilities in the clockspeed_cli domain.

template.name: clockspeed_run_cli
template.summary: Allow the specified role the clockspeed_cli domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the clockspeed_cli domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the clockspeed_cli domain to use.
